title: Randomly Disconnected out of nowhere
body: I'm disconnecting randomly throughout the game for anywhere between 4 seconds to 5 minutes. My internet is fine, as I was browsing the boards looking for a solution while I was disconnecting. Is anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: Though your internet seems fine, you can still have issues reaching specific services like the game server.  Your issue sounds like some unstable connection to the game server, so my suggestion would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that clears things up!
The problem seemed to go away on its own after a day or so. I definitely will refer to the guide if the problem persists.
